name: typed-props
description: Facebook's PropTypes standalone extensible implementation for browser and server

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:node && npm run build:checksum -- dist/*.js
scripts.build:web: npm run build:compile && npm run build:concat && npm run build:minify && rm -rf dist/src
scripts.build:checksum: bash -c 'for file in $@; do echo `shasum -b -a 384 $file | xxd -r -p | base64` $file >> dist/checksum.txt; done' --
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build

author: rumkin
